name: Online Class Simulator
description:
Online Class Simulator is a resource management game I made for my Modeling and Simulation Development course at Marshall University. 

Your professor has just emailed you with a surprise midterm assignment due in only a week. You are quarantined in your dorm room and have to do everything from here.Finish the project within the 7 days to pass. But don't run out of energy! You can also buy upgrades to your room online by using money from your online job to help make your project easier.

This game is another really fun game that has a silly feel to it. But the code that I did for it was rather complex and did take some thinking through. I'm most proud of how I balanced the game and the UI design I did.

With this project I learned game development, game design, UI design, and difficulty balancing.
